ve_testing_notification_text: VE Testing is available at all MARA Meetings. Just contact us in advance so we can bring the materials.
error_404_message: Calling CQ won't help in this instance. Perhaps try another frequency?
notifications:
We regret to inform you that monthly club meetings are currently cancelled.
Meetings will continue when the Community Room at the MPD Copper Sky Substation reopens to the public.
